## Definition of Done (checklist)
- [ ] Builds locally (Debug)
- [ ] CI green (tests + assemble)
- [ ] Changes match SPEC.md (single source of truth)
- [ ] Domain logic remains pure Kotlin (no Android deps)
- [ ] UI is state-driven (no combat/spawn logic in composables)
- [ ] Unit tests added/updated as needed
- [ ] No Ads/IAP SDK added (MVP rule)
